title: 抵美抗爭者心聲全文 -- 黑暗中的一點光

replies.msg:
黑暗中的一點光
抗爭者：

首先，我們想以真切誠懇的心，感謝所有關心香港的人、美國政府及HKDC的幫助及支持。
我們是已經流亡美國、捍衛民主自由的青年。我們暫時在美國十分安全。從離開香港的一刻，
心情有點不安、擔心、百感交集。

每次看到香港的情況每況愈下，我們對香港所有人及事多一分擔憂。

雖然我們離開了我們的家，但依然心繫香港，為所有愛香港的人打氣。

我們未來會開始我們的新生活。未來就算有多困難、艱鉅，都會以香港「獅子山下」精神，與
香港人一起面對逆境。

我想引用一位香港人曾經鼓勵過我們的一句說話，對香港人說：「只要有微弱的亮光，就沒有
所謂的黑暗。」

共勉之。

A Glimmer of Light in Dark Times
Statement from the group of Hong Kong activists:

“We want to share our sincere thanks to everyone who cares about Hong Kong and to the US
government and HKDC for all their help and support. We are young pro-democracy fighters now in exile.

We are now safe in the United States. From the moment we left Hong Kong, our hearts have been filledwith anxiety and all kinds of emotions. Whenever we see Hong Kong in the news and how the situation has become worse and worse, we are even more concerned and worried about all Hong Kongers.

Even though we have left our home, our hearts remain there and we stand with everyone fighting for Hong Kong. As we begin our new life, despite the difficulties and obstacles ahead of us, we will face the future and challenges with the ‘lion rock’ spirit, just like all Hong Kongers.

As a fellow Hong Konger once shared with us, ‘As long as there is a glimmer of light, there is no darkness.’

To everyone rooting for us, we are rooting for you. Thank you.”

https://hkdc.us/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/hkdc-%E8%81%B2%E6%98%8E_-%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E5%B9%B4%E8%BC%95%E6%8A%97%E7%88%AD%E8%80%85%E5%9C%A8%E7%BE%8E%E5%BE%97%E5%88%B0%E9%81%BF%E9%9B%A3%E6%89%80-01.15.2021.pdf

https://hkdc.us/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/hkdc-statement_-young-hong-kong-activists-safe-in-the-us-01.15.2021-.pdf
願大家平安

quote.msg: 願大家平安

replies.msg: Push
平安 我地永不言敗

quote.msg: Push

希望喺往後嘅日子我哋都仲可以跨國界團結起來消滅世界上呢一個最邪惡嘅勢力

我們永不忘記 我們永不原諒
我們必定反抗 我們必定報仇

我願榮光歸香港

光復香港 時代革命
沒有暴徒 只有暴政
五大訴求 缺一不可
剿滅匪類 刻不容緩
民族自強 香港獨立
香港人 建國
天滅中共 全黨死清光
